data.text: @Storm4Congress Did Fauci allow them to drop the masks?  Better ask the gnome!
@Storm4Congress I was reading this last night and was laughing… 6 feet and masks AGAIN… 🙄🙄🙄 only masks that should be worn is oxygen masks conntected to tanks for people with breathing problems…
@TheOrac93482874 @Storm4Congress I’ve got some. I was on iodoral for years as a kid. Didn’t know it was the same thing (kinda).
@chump24042266 @Storm4Congress And what about stockpiling and distributing potassium iodide just in case?  I got mine.  It’s especially important for kids to prevent thyroid cancer afterwards.
@Storm4Congress Wearing a mask in a nuclear detonation will burn your face as well as leave pattern marks. But if I am that close I still won’t be wearing one.
@Storm4Congress If it wasn't so stupidly sad it would be funny. Do they just sit around and think up stupid crap to see what plebes will go along with?

@Storm4Congress It’s breathtaking, really. You think they would mention things like taking your clothes off, taking a shower, not bringing anything in that was outside, for starters. Don’t catch a cold wasn’t really on my radar.

@Storm4Congress Is this a recent change (in since the invasion) to the nuclear readiness guide? Or did this get entered at the start of the pandemic? If it's recent, that's concerning. Why would they feel the need to update it now?
